page.title: 16A day in my life
page.content: 7.30am I woke up and got dressed 7.45 I had toast with marmalade and orange juice for breakfast 8.30 I went to school 8.50 School begins at this time 9.00 This is when everyone goes into the hall for a service 9.30 Handwriting practice 10.00 We all go to different rooms for a language activity lesson 10.40 We all go out to play 11.00 We all do a type of maths called Ginn 12.00 It is now time for dinner. 1.15 We go into school to do our Domesday work 2.30 We go out to play 2.45 We come back into school and do our newspapers 3.00 Our class teacher read to us. 3.15 End of school. I watched TV all the evening and went to bed at 8.30.
